content.raw: The `<joint><physics><provide_feedback>` tag is already in sdf_1.4; it just doesn't work with urdf's. The `<joint><physics><ode><provide_feedback>` tag is [marked as deprecated](#!/osrf/sdformat/src/c6c850bc0ce64fd3c51db149aee03ec63957daa5/sdf/1.4/joint.sdf?at=sdf_1.4#cl-135) to be removed in sdf 1.5. So I think that this pull request can go to sdf_1.4, but that we can remove `<joint><physics><ode><provide_feedback>` in 1.5.
content.html: The <joint><physics><provide_feedback> tag is already in sdf_1.4; it just doesn't work with urdf's. The <joint><physics><ode><provide_feedback> tag is marked as deprecated to be removed in sdf 1.5. So I think that this pull request can go to sdf_1.4, but that we can remove <joint><physics><ode><provide_feedback> in 1.5.
